roleset.name: badmouthing, with intent to discredit
roleset.note: MUDSLINGING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from mudslinging.01-n)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: But this is all simply a tactic by Mr Warner to continue his mudslinging at the Government that he is no longer a part of.
example.arg: at the Government that he is no longer a part of
